title: Coupon Applied Event Data
description: Data payload for the ecommerce.coupon_applied event. Fired when a user successfully applies a coupon or promo code to their cart or order.

coupon.description: The coupon or promo code that was applied.

orderId.description: The order or transaction identifier the coupon was applied to, if applicable.

discount.description: The monetary discount value resulting from the coupon.
